original_title: Golden Earring - You Know We Love You
overview: Golden Earring’s last performance ever, held at the Rotterdam Ahoy on 16th November 2019. The DVD includes 19 songs and was also released as a 2CD live album.  Acoustic Guitar – George Kooymans Bass – Rinus Gerritsen Drums – Cesar Zuiderwijk Guitar – Barry Hay, George Kooymans Keyboards – Rinus Gerritsen Lead Vocals – Barry Hay Saxophone – Bertus Borgers Vocals – George Kooymans  Mastered By – Sander Van Der Heide Mixed By – John Sonneveld Producer – Golden Earring Project Manager – Wouter Bessels
title: Golden Earring - You Know We Love You
